name: Munnar
shortDescription: Hill station famous for tea gardens and cool climate.
longDescription: Munnar is a popular hill station in Kerala, known for its rolling tea estates, misty hills and pleasant climate.

name: Alleppey (Alappuzha)
longDescription: Alleppey is famous for backwater houseboat cruises, serene canals and village life.

name: Goa
longDescription: Goa is India’s beach capital, known for its lively beaches, seafood and nightlife.
